EngageManifest.Title: Ribbon
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the image with the title and content of your slide in a transparent black ribbon over the left side of your slide.

Currently this template is a set height and width, but that can be easily altered via the included Style.css file, or via the portal stylesheet.

There are semi-transparent controls to move forward and backward, as well as play and pause in the lower right hand corner of the slide.
